short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily close tabs by domain with a clean, organized interface for better tab management and efficiency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your browsing experience with an intuitive and organized interface that allows you to quickly close tabs by domain, helping you declutter your workspace and enhance your productivity.
